page.title: 10LANDSCAPE AND BUILDINGS
page.content: The overall picture within the grid is a valley with gentle slopes eash side covered with farmland and woodlands. A good road traverses the valley from Fawkham Green to Longfield & this road is well used. Acess to the A20/M20 motorways is available via this valley road passing by the Brands Hatch Racing Circuit.Country lanes off the valley road are narrow and lead out of the valley to neighbouring villages. Build- ings consist mainly of private council, fram and manor houses and barns.Also one hotel & two leisure complexes. Ten historic farmhouses continue to serve the farming and boading kennels orientatd community.At the Horton Kirby end 60 council houses have been built adjacent to the Saxon burial ground and are called Saxon Place.
